title: After The Virus
description: Life made you get your hands dirty; life was vengeful if you tried an easy route.After the virus decimates 99.9% of the world's population and all traces of humanity along with it, Rhiannon and Will are forced to move beyond their past fame, fortune, and personal demons to rescue a mute girl from the clutches of two warring cults.------------------------This stand-alone 60k word novel is a post-apocalyptic love story from award-winning writer Meghan Ciana Doidge (Dowser Series, OracleSeries). this novel contains mature situations, violence, and coarse language.
author: Meghan Ciana Doidge
